title: Leading gaming content on Twitch H1 2019 , by hours watched
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
The Number of hours watched is appeared to be the highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
The highest Games League of Legends has 393.8 more Number of hours watched than the lowest Games World of Warcraft.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
The maximum Number of hours watched 512.3 is found at Games League of Legends and the minimum is found at World of Warcraft where Games is 118.5.

The Number of hours watched is appeared to be the highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.

max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Games, and Number of hours watched in each Games on the y axis.
The Number of hours watched is highest at Games League of Legends and lowest at Games World of Warcraft.
Games Fortnite has the second highest value for Number of hours watched.
The Number of hours watched of Games League of Legends is 4.32% larger than the minimum value at World of Warcraft.
Games League of Legends is higher than any other Gamess with value 512.3, followed by Fortnite, and Just Chatting. Down to Games World of Warcraft with the lowest value 118.5.
The Games World of Warcraft tends to be 1.98 percent lower than average.
